entry.title: WIND WARNING , Waterton Park
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:04 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waterton Park Gate 02:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: SSW 49 km/h gust 66 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 80 gusting to 100 this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 7:54 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:54 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 before morning. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 7:54 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
